org.easyrules.api

Interface RuleListener


  • public interface RuleListener
    A listener for rules execution events.
    Author:
    Mahmoud Ben Hassine (mahmoud@benhassine.fr)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void beforeExecute(Rule rule)
      Triggered before the execution of a rule.
      void onFailure(Rule rule, java.lang.Exception exception)
      Triggered after a rule has failed.
      void onSuccess(Rule rule)
      Triggered after a rule has been executed successfully.

    • Method Detail

      • beforeExecute

        void beforeExecute(Rule rule)
        Triggered before the execution of a rule.
        Parameters:
        rule - the current rule

      • onFailure

        void onFailure(Rule rule,
             java.lang.Exception exception)
        Triggered after a rule has failed.
        Parameters:
        rule - the current rule
        exception - the exception thrown when attempting to execute the rule

      • onSuccess

        void onSuccess(Rule rule)
        Triggered after a rule has been executed successfully.
        Parameters:
        rule - the current rule
